title: 20 Pairs 40 Pcs Heavy Duty Rear Mounting Brackets for Drawer Slide Drawer Runner Width 1.77 Inch(45mm) for Soft Close Cabinet Drawer Slides, Full Extension Ball Bearing Side Mount Drawer Tracks
description: Features:  Our cabinet drawer brackets can support a good amount of weight due to the material quality and design. This makes them apt for heavy duty drawers where frequent opening and closing operations occur, ensuring your furniture's longevity and effectiveness.  The soft close drawer slides bracket comes with an easy installation process. They can be quickly mounted at the rear of the drawer, providing support to the drawer rails, making your drawers operate smoothly  Specifications: Material: cold rolled steel Color: silver Size: about 3.54 x 1.86 x 1.1 inches/ 90 x 47.2 x 28 mm  Package includes: 40 X Rear mounting bracket for drawer slides  Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size.
